website_summaries.verdict: An affordable catcher's set designed for a young player who is just starting his or her venture into the sport.
pros: Like all but the Under Armour brand, this catcher's set comes with a chest protector, leg guards, and a helmet
The gear is lighter weight than other manufactures, which increases a player's mobility and comfort
cons: It is possible for the metal fasteners that hold the leg guards on to come undone if they are sufficiently twisted during play

customer_reviews.title: This set is good for 6-9yrs maybe 10-11 yrs if your kid is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I thought it would be. My son and I have played with it 20x now and he loves it. My son is 7yrs, 50 inches height and 55lbs. This set is good for 6-9yrs maybe 10-11 yrs if your kid is a bit under size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It feels a little cheap and doesn't offer full protection like some of the higher end sets do
customer_reviews.text: This gear is more for rec ball rather than travel. My son had this less than a full travel season and the helmet straps broke. It feels a little cheap and doesn't offer full protection like some of the higher end sets do. We are already replacing this set, and I will not be buying this again. If your son wants to try the position, but isn't sure he will stick with it... this is perfect. However, if he loves to catch and plays with a competitive team, I'd spend the extra money and get higher end.
customer_reviews.author: MGregory

customer_reviews.title: Great set, but helmet scratches when you try to take it off quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I spent weeks trying to find the best catchers gear for my 10yr old son thatbwouldnt break the bank. Overall this a great set. He is very comfortable in it. His only complaint is the mask. The back lip is kinda sharp and scratches him if he tries to rip the helmet off. It's very comfortable while it's on. Due to this he hasnt used it in a game yet. I need to sand it down or find something to put over it, but all in all a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Muggle Mom

customer_reviews.title: Kids love wearing it, mom thrilled nobody is getting hurt.
customer_reviews.text: The kids in the neighborhood fight over who gets to be the catcher. They love this gear!! The helmet looks cool and the pads make sure you don't get hurt. As a mom - I'm thrilled that my kids want to wear safety gear! I'd never want my kid behind a batter without at least wearing a helmet. The "cool factor" of this set makes that happen. I definitely suggest also getting the little wedge pads to attach to the back of the calves to make squatting more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Katbake

customer_reviews.title: Didnt last 2 full games
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son to use on his baseball team. He wore it twice, in the middle of the second game one of he snaps on the helmet broke. The metal square on the inside of the helmet came off and the strap will no longer snap on. It happened this past Saturday (May 7th) but because I didn't get a chance to report it until now (May 11th) I am past my 30 day return policy (ended May 8th). I'm very upset because the team no longer has a catchers helmet they can use and we have 2 games this week. Should have lasted more than 2 games.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrica

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment
customer_reviews.text: This catchers equipment was actually purchased for use of our Little League team. My son is about 49 in tall and weighs about 60 lbs and it fit him great. protects well and adjusted for larger or smaller kids on our team. Cant really go wrong with Easton products.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen P. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8U travel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome catcher gear. We use it for our 8U travel team. Good size. Holds up well. Bought a throat guard to go with it and some knee savers. The knee savers were a little big so we don't use them. Should have went a size down on those but actually think its better to not have them at this age.
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Kids love the Gear
customer_reviews.text: We bought a Easton Catcher's set for our 9U team, and the kids love it! The league provided a bigger set, but it was too big and clumsy. The set allows the kids to have much better mobility. Before, we had problems with kids not being able to get set properly. This chest guard actually fits smaller players, allowing them to crouch comfortably behind the plate. One small complaint the kids have is that the face mask is hard to take off quickly. They were used to the bigger mask that fit them big, and was easy to take off when runners were going, etc. Overall, the kids really love the set.
customer_reviews.author: Sinohe K. Terrero

customer_reviews.title: Catcher’s mask
customer_reviews.text: The helmet contains a screw (same one on two different mask) and it came completely out on two different mask sets without ever been used in a game. It came apart on both within a week on both masks after receiving. I love Easton products (bats) but catcher’s gear must not be their forte. The shins guards were great but catcher’s mask is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter when she started catching. She was 10 at the time and is still wearing it now at 11. She probably can even get another year or 2 out of it. Its a lot more lightweight that the team gear she had been using, which is good because she can move quicker in this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Set for Girls Softball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old daughter in her first season of catching girl's fastpitch. The helmet was a bit uncomfortable for her, so we swapped it for another with better padding. However, the leg pads and chest protector fit well, and were comfortable with a bit of room to grow over the next season or two. As far as looks, she's been complimented quite a bit. Overall, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nursing in Pink

customer_reviews.title: Easton Youth Black Magic Catcher Box Set
customer_reviews.text: NIce set for the money. We bought this for our grandson and he like it a lot. It seems to fit nicely and still lets him move. We would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Great equipment!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two sets of equipment in for my son's 9u baseball team; ordered one in black and silver and another in red and silver. The equipments looks sharp, the kids loved it! I would recommend this equipment!
customer_reviews.author: 2Preciosos

customer_reviews.title: For my grandson - he LOVES the outfit - they ...
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson - he LOVES the outfit - they took first place last year, so he thinks it because of his outifit lol
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Maniere

customer_reviews.title: Great for a starter set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a starter set for my 9 year old. He's about 4'9" and 75 lbs. Fits secure, the chest pad might be a little small in terms of coverage but the shin guards are great as well as the helmet. I've seen complaints about helmet size, but there are a lot of adjustments that can be made and the internal chin guard is gel-padded for comfort. My son even wears his glasses under the helmet without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great catcher set! Purchased two for our 8U and 10U softball teams and they have been great. We love that they are red, which matches our team colors, rather than the boring black all the other teams have. They are great quality and the girls prefer these to the older ones we had. Fits both teams great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This catchers gear is perfect for my 10 year old. Like most Easton products we've purchased, this gear seems to be very well constructed and had an amazing price with Amazon. My only complaint is the adjustment strap on the chest protector, we have the horizontal strap adjusted as small as possible but it looks a little goofy. Hard to explain but basically the straps on his back look more like this "y" instead of this "Y".
customer_reviews.author: MRHD

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: I coach a 10U baseball team and this gear fits my 8 year old son and our bigger 10 year old starting catcher perfectly. Very pleased with the sizing and the gear seems to be well made. Only had it for a month, so it's hard to say how it will hold up, but so far I am happy with the set. Hate that it's made in China, but unfortunately that's the world we live in today. Overall I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffdigger

customer_reviews.title: Great starter set
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set of equipment for 9-10 year old daughter that plays softball. Everything goes on/off easily and it protects her very well. I'm sure she'll need to upgrade her equipment when she gets a bit older and those softballs are coming in much faster than they are now.
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: My 11 yr old son loves this gear. He can get it on and off with ease and the adjustments right out of box was really easy and simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easton Catchers Gear
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to try catching so last year for fall ball we picked up this set for him to try. I looked around on various websites for used gear since he wasn't sure if really wanted to catch, but people were selling their used gear for pretty close to what this went for new. Everything fits really well and seems to be holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: EKingren

customer_reviews.title: and I love that fact
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old loves this gear. It's a bit large for her, but it still fits well enough. She has plenty of room to grow into it, and I love that fact. Her confidence behind the plate has skyrocketed and I'm confident in it protecting her.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Young

customer_reviews.title: This is more for large 8 year olds or small 10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: My son is 6 but he wears a size 10 clothes and a size 2 shoe. Not a chunky kid. He is just the biggest in his kinder class and far from fat. I looked this up did much reasearch on size. Read reviews and seamed to be the right choice other than a red set that was for younger kids from another vendor. The shin guards are a little long but for the most part he loves it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Quinones

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The shin guards are a great fit for my ten year old catcher. Wish the chest guard had a hook on one side to make it easier to take on and off but otherwise really good. Love the hockey style mask over the old traditional mask and I was a catcher through high school. For the price, you can not get any better. Great starter kit to build off as he grows out of certain pieces.
customer_reviews.author: BVerrette

customer_reviews.title: Snaps vs Velcro! Great set.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for all this equipment. My husband read lots of reviews and we compared to what we could purchase locally. Snaps work better than Velcro from what we understand. Hope to use for many more seasons.
customer_reviews.author: MSClintonFamily

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Used it for one season so far. A lot better than the gear that was given to the teams by the rec dept. Fit a 9 year old girl perfectly. She should get at least 2 or 3 years use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Easton. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, my daughter loves it. She is 12 and is about 4"9 107 pounds. Fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jill W.

customer_reviews.title: Have no fear
customer_reviews.text: This catcher's set is very heavy duty. I was very impressed with this equipment. If they want behind the plate, have no fear with this gear.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL UNDERWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Beat the hell out of it
customer_reviews.text: Don’t feel bad about beating it up for the price. Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: John Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: Price is good and the catching gear seems to be holding up ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased for a beginning catcher that is only 10 years old. He is very thin but this catchers gear will gets its use out of it as it has plenty of room to grow. Price is good and the catching gear seems to be holding up also. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: This set works just fine so he doesn't have to use the league supplied ...
customer_reviews.text: This set fits my 9 year old perfectly. He has short, stocky legs so I wasn't sure that the Youth would fit him. We were pleasantly surprised that the set fits him well. This set works just fine so he doesn't have to use the league supplied gear.
customer_reviews.author: Phydeaou

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 yr old who is 54" tall and 71 lbs. Had to tighten everything up a fair amount, but it fits him well with room to grow. Seems to be very good quality. I'm betting it should last him at least 3 seasons, depending on how much he grows.
customer_reviews.author: lessernobleman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Youth baseball
customer_reviews.text: My son is 10 years old - he's tall and average build. This was perfect for him with plenty of room for him to grow as well. Well build and quite durable especially at such a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Tracy

customer_reviews.title: This is nice entry level gear
customer_reviews.text: This is nice entry level gear, I bought this because I wasn't sure if my son was serious about playing catcher. The gear held up pretty well. The helmet is nice. The chest protector is a bit large on my son he's very thin though
customer_reviews.author: JohninNY

customer_reviews.title: Clips for shin guards.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. I like the clips on the shin guards. Unfortunately it was too big for my boy so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: missbehavin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SET
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son as he has been playing catcher more and more. Set works perfectly. The whole team uses it and even fights over who is catching because they all want to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Caddell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Good gear at a decent price. Bought it for my 9 1/2 year old son and it fits well if you adjust the straps down - he is a very fit and stout 9 y/o - between baseball/football/basketball he trains at D1 and weighs about 80-90Lbs. I say that so you can have an idea of his size in judging for your kido and this gear. It will certainly grow with him for a year or two. The chest protector can ride up when he squats but it isn't bad and he actually prefers that a bit (covers his neck better + the hockey style mask).
customer_reviews.author: MojoMatic

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This is the same set you buy at your local sporting goods store for half the price. Enough said..... Very happy. Fits my avg to big 9yo with a little room to grow. If your a little league coach just looking for catchers gear for your team, save your self some headache and get this set.
customer_reviews.author: joe fenton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Runs a bit large. You would need a very large 9 years old for this to fit. My 10 yr old can use but the length of the shin guards are a bit long, definitely will go up to 13 or 14yr old. The helmet fits well and is adjustable so not an issue
customer_reviews.author: J Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  Bought this euipment 4 years ago and still going, no issues.
customer_reviews.text: My son has had this equipment for 4 years. Held up great and still uses it. The equipment has grown with him.
customer_reviews.author: Beachy77

customer_reviews.title: Amazing catching gear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10u daughter and she needed some catching gear . And it fit amazing and she is a little small so we had to adjust it just a bit but the straps are flexible so there very east to adjust it also is very comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This gear is amazing. Great quality, my son loves it. Fits him perfect. He is an average size 8 yr old. He has bigger 9 and 10 yr olds on his team that also use it and it adjusts and fits them great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bennett

customer_reviews.title: These are great but there is a slight gap between the knee ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great but there is a slight gap between the knee cap and the shin that balls are magically attracted to.
customer_reviews.author: Nevel

customer_reviews.title: but it is going great now. It would have been helpful to have ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a couple uses to break it in, but it is going great now. It would have been helpful to have knee protectors included in this pack or to have some that work well that were add ons. We used other ones and they have not been great.
customer_reviews.author: Aigean

customer_reviews.title: Good gear
customer_reviews.text: I use this as an extra set and it works out great. The size is good for my 10-11 year olds, but too large for the 8 year olds--basically like it says on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver A. Greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great investment if you have a kid playing baseball! It fit my 8 year old perfect and she loves it! I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: ... size fit my husky 11 yr old boy just perfect. I reccomend getting the knee saver pads to ...
customer_reviews.text: The 9-12yr size fit my husky 11 yr old boy just perfect. I reccomend getting the knee saver pads to go along with this set. I wish it came with a bag.
customer_reviews.author: szdbowen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for 9 year olds.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old baseball team and have a few kids catching ranging from 60 to 90 pounds and various heights and works great for all of them with a few minor adjustments at times. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: JAK

customer_reviews.title: Good Little League Set
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my son who is about 70 lbs and about 4'7" and the price was right also.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Duso

customer_reviews.title: looks awesome works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 9 year old daughter. She's taller than average. Was too big for most the other girls on the team. 3rd/4th Grade mix softball team.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C 424

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. A little big for my 10yo girl.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this gear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gear for my 10 year old son, it has been through a regular season, and all star season. Holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of gear
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my grandson who catches in little league. Fit well, looks good and seems to give good protection. Price was very good.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Nice set, too big for skinny 12 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Looked well made and sturdy. Was too big for my skinny 12 year old though,so check your measurements. We did and it was still too big! Sent ours back.
customer_reviews.author: LJMom

customer_reviews.title: he liked it even more when his coach said "you look ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 y/o son loves it and it protected him well from a few hits. Of course, he liked it even more when his coach said "you look like a Transformer."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little cheap
customer_reviews.text: I like the set, and my son was thrilled. I just hope it fits right because its really hard to order the right size online. Also, the chest protector seems a little cheap and flimsy. Helmet and shin guards are nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Black Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great for Little League!
customer_reviews.text: This catcher's equipment set looks great, fits perfect, and makes our 9-year-old Little Leaguer look like a pro! It's also extremely functional, keeps him well-protected, and on top of all that - it was $50 cheaper than at our local youth sports outlet store. We couldn't be happier with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Porter

customer_reviews.title: fits great for him to play catcher
customer_reviews.text: just what he wanted, fits great for him to play catcher, he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Syd

customer_reviews.title: Great gear for little league
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit more my thin 10 yo boy. Loves catcher position and team equipment was ill fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Cohn

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son is around average size for his age and this set fit him absolutely perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this equipment today. My child was so excited that we had to put it on and immediately go out and practice. It fits great. It has several ways to adjust to size. My child is almost 11 and is about 4'11 and 70 lbs. Nice sleek look and really is an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Willow H.

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. This is ideal for a player just starting this position. The equipment is durable and easy to use. More serious catchers will need to purchase higher quality gear though.
customer_reviews.author: blc69

customer_reviews.title: Padding falls out/ not replaceable
customer_reviews.text: Padding fell out of helmet after first month. No replacement pieces available for the gear
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. we expect 3-4 years of youth league ...
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying 5 sets for our youth league. They fit the 7-9 years girls perfectly. Good quality. we expect 3-4 years of youth league service. You should get a lot more time out of them if for one player.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: It is made from good material and he absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.text: This catcher gear is exactly what we were looking for, for our 9 yeae old. It is made from good material and he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easton Youth Black Magic Catcher Box Set, Black
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for our 10 year old grandson. It fits him well with the adjusting straps which make it usable for 2 or 3 year. It arrived on time in great packaging. He absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Good at the price
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the money. Straps slip through the D rings on the shin guards too easily. Chest protector rides up into my sons neck. No adjustment seems to help. Would recommend as a practice set but would spend more for a better set for game use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe T.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable fit
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 11yo nephew nicely, and he's average height but a little chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Britany

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be pretty well made and looks like it'll hold up
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty well made and looks like it'll hold up. We'll see. I bought it for my nine year old and it seems to fit him pretty well after getting things adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Fortunately, we had a spare
customer_reviews.text: The helmet broke in the first season. Fortunately, we had a spare.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Love this set it is way better than the Wilson ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this set it is way better than the Wilson Set. I love the fact that the shinguards have clips instead of Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos T

customer_reviews.title: Great...except for the shin guard latches!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 year old daughter who is a first time catcher. I have no complaints other than the latches for the shint guards constantly come undone. Kind of a pain, need to find an alternative way of keeping them latched for games, but other than that ok.
customer_reviews.author: Randi Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality at half the cost of local sporting goods ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at half the cost of local sporting goods store. Very happy with this purchase and my grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Pambowens

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is well made. Fits my 11 year old good and has room to grow. Easy to put on. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: Good price, good investment
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, my grandson loves having his own catcher's gear.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Furter

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: Fit's my 10 year old daughter nice with some room to grow into. Another real quality Easton product.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent equiptment at a good price! Very happy with the sizing and the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

customer_reviews.title: great catchers gear
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new catchers gear. Red white combo is very slick and is very well fitted even though he is a smaller kid
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: It was such a good deal compared to some of the other things I ...
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this set so far. It was such a good deal compared to some of the other things I found online. It seems to be of good quality, so hopefully it will hold up for a while until he outgrows it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: After looking at a lot of catcher's gear for my son, I decided to go with this set. Great value, well made, and sharp looking! My son loves the gear and is excited to start wearing it!
customer_reviews.author: mark hefel

customer_reviews.title: Great set for price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for 7 and 8 year old boys, great price on Amazon for this set!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a second replacement set. He is playing on 12u and fits perfectly. Price was not best but it was prime. It came quickly and works for my setup. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Coach T

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought set in May, my 9yr old used it for less than a month until season ended. Got it out last week and used it at one practice and the face mask is broken. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke L. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 11 year old. Should work well for 2-3 more years at least. Much cheaper here than anywhere else you can find in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sander

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price. Not top notch quality but as fast as kids grow, this is all you need.
customer_reviews.text: Cost effective and works well. Fits smaller to average sized athletes. 10-12 yrs old
customer_reviews.author: datrep

customer_reviews.title: Youth Catchers Set
customer_reviews.text: Equipment looks solid; the catcher's mask/helmet is what truly makes this set. It has a great design and should fit a wide variety of children's heads. Set will be used by pitching machine up to Cal Ripken's.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good beginner's catcher set!
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of skeptical in buying one of the "cheapest" catchers gear for my son, but I was pleasantly surprised. Easton has been around for a long time, so I trust the name. As for my my son (7), he loves/feels comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander173

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so happy to get this for Christmas hoping it helps him learn to pitch better nice set
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: My boys received this from Santa, and they went crazy. Fits them well, and they are 8 and 10 years old.
customer_reviews.author: dawnken

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who was playing catcher in youth baseball. The gear works great and he has been very happy.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding look, feel and functionality. Fits my tallish ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding look, feel and functionality. Fits my tallish 10 y.o. son very well. The only drawback is no throat protector which is required in little league.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gwynn

customer_reviews.title: Good Catchers Gear
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 12 year old at about 65 pounds. Great set, fits well and expect to last a couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Brett A Wallace

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FIT
customer_reviews.text: MY GRANDSON REC'D THIS PRODUCT & LOVEDdddd IT & IT FIT PERFECT...HE IS SO EXCITED TO WEAR TO HIS NEXT GAME...
customer_reviews.author: ellan s.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money especially for coaches looking to use it for the team rather than using the equipment provided by the league.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 9U
customer_reviews.text: My son is above average for a 9U player and this gear is perfect. Fits great and it is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: mikeymo25

customer_reviews.title: It's a great set and he'll definitley have room to grow
customer_reviews.text: Giving htis a 4 star rating for now - only because my son hasn't used it yet. He won't until spring. That said, he LOVES it! It's a great set and he'll definitley have room to grow. The true test will be to see how it functions in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Kate W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: High quality set perfect for my 10 year old (about 75 lbs). Another player on the team is 11, weighs about 110, and brights his own (slightly larger) shin guards, but uses the mask and chest protector from this set. No complaints - the pieces are lightweight and durable. Nice that it is color neutral (black and silver), so that it matches this year's jersey (Royals) and last year's jersey (Cardinals). Suggestion - Manufacturers should start including the throat dangle with these sets, given its uniform requirement for all Little League play.
customer_reviews.author: JKapp

customer_reviews.title: Great gear!
customer_reviews.text: This is great starters catchers gear. I bought it for my 10-year-old son and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kelbrat

customer_reviews.title: ... and wear this set has already gotten we are pleased.
customer_reviews.text: For the price and wear this set has already gotten we are pleased.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Solid set of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great set of catcher's equipment. Has been very durable. And very good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

product_meta.title: Easton Youth Black Magic Catcher Box Set
product_meta.description: includes everything needed to protect players at the dish. Catchers can fearlessly chase down pitches while wearing the pro-style varsity helmet and throat protector to avoid season-ending head and neck injuries. Tough plays at the plate are no problem, as the double-knee leg guards and varsity chest protector absorb the impact of sliding runners. Pro-style varsity catcher's helmet prevents dangerous head injuries 4 in. throat protector keeps the neck safe from wild pitches and errant swings MCB80 varsity female chest protector absorbs the direct impact of the ball Double-knee leg guards shield against sliding runners and low fastballs Women's gear pack is designed for fast-pitch softball players ages 14 and up Specifications:Activity: Softball Athletic Supporter Included: No Brand: MacGregor Quantity: 1 Recommended Age Use: Adults Throat Protector: Yes Package includes: Pro style varsity catcher's helmet MCB80 varsity female chest protector Prep double knee leg guards 4" throat protector For ages 14+
feature_bullets: Great set of gear for beginners
Black Magic Helmet (6"-7") Black Magic Chest Protector (14") Black Magic Leg Guards (12.7")
